#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<climits>
 
#define mod 1000000007
 
#define ll long long
 
#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define repex(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define in(type,x) scanf("%" #type,&x)
#define out(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type " ",x)
#define outln(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type "\n",x)
#define p(type,x) printf(" %"#type" ",x)
#define fill(a,val,n) memset(a,val,n)
#define test int t;\
			 in(d,t);\
			 while(t--)
 
using namespace std;
 
int input()
{
int flag=0,t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9'){
if(c=='-')
flag=1;
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
if(flag)
t*=-1;
return(t);
}
 
 
int main()
{//sieve();
 test
 {int n,a[100002];
 
  int hash[1000002]={0};
 
  int ans=1,maxi=-1;
 
  in(d,n);
  rep(i,1,n)
  {a[i]=input();
   maxi=max(a[i],maxi);
   hash[a[i]]++;
  }
 
  for(int i=maxi;i>=2;i--)
   {int c=0;
    for(int j=i;j<=maxi;j+=i)
     {c+=hash[j];    //count how many numbers have i as factor
      if(c>=2)		 // if more than one have i as factor, take it as their gcd
       break;
     }
    if(c>=2)
	  {ans=i;
      break;
      }
   }
 
   printf("%d\n",ans);
 }
 
 
return 0;
}
